pkgmetadata.longdescription: White Test and Bootstrapped White Test for Heteroskedasticity // Formal implementation of White test of heteroskedasticity and a bootstrapped version of it, developed under the methodology of Jeong, J., Lee, K. (1999) https://yonsei.pure.elsevier.com/en/publications/bootstrapped- whites-test-for-heteroskedasticity-in-regression-mod.
